snippet.title: Bonkers - Cute Platformer
snippet.description:
Purchase on itch.io https://milkbar-lads.itch.io/bonkers Dr. Onion has ripped a bunch of holes in space in order to kidnap Apple's beloved dog! Help Apple get her dog back and give Dr. Onion a whoopin'!

➡️ More from Milkbar Lads https://milkbar-lads.itch.io/
➡️ More platformer games https://itch.io/games/genre-platformer

#itchio #indiegames
